Guard 3: Teeheehee! Small bot thinks he can handle us, eh? Oh! Guys, I
got an idea.

The four guards came closer, whispering and laughing, then Guard 4
came nearer.

Guard4: Alright, alright. No joking. You want to get tested in? Go to
that room and challenge the one in it.

He handed Quicktrike a little datapad that had a number on it.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "Why, I can slag anything that walks, slithers, crawls, flies or 
> swims. Bring on the obstacles an' all knock them down!"  Quickstrike 
> said vigorously.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > Guard 1: Hey, ease off, Dirtcrawler! You gotta prove yourself 
> before
> > we actually accept you in the Army.
> > 
> > Guard 2 (chuckling): Yeah, and it's not just 'cause you're a cowbot
> > that you can survive on abattlefield!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > "Well,  looks like they got alot of buggers down here.  I ganer 
> if 
> > > they have a pub,"  He commented as his snake head on the end of 
> his 
> > > tail glanced around.
> > > "Quickstrike terrorize!"  He converted back to his robot form.
> > > "So you guys got a sign up form for kickin' butt?"  He asked the 
> > > four guards.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > > > The inside of that hatch ended up in a busy tunnel. Four armed 
> > > guards
> > > > watched over the passage. Civilians roamed everywhere, 
> bringing 
> > > goods
> > > > and materials to the base, and packing small freighters in the
> > > > shipping docks.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > "You'd think they'd make a bigger door."  He commented 
> before 
> > > > > changing into his beast mode and crawling through the hatch.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > > Sentry: Remain still.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > The sentry quickly run a scanner on Quickstrike. It showed 
> > > nothing
> > > > > > wrong with him, and he was definetely not a Minion.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Behind the guns, a small hatch opened, allowing entry to 
> > > > > Quickstrike.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Sentry: You are clear, but we strongly advise that you 
> continue
> > > > > > behaving. Please proceed.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" 
> <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > Quickstrike took a step back in surprise when he saw how 
> > > large 
> > > > > the 
> > > > > > > guns are.'Now these are by kinda people alright'.
> > > > > > > "Why I'm Quickstrike.  The toughest bot around.  I saw 
> > > lookin' 
> > > > > to 
> > > > > > > see if ya had an opening."
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" 
> <gestaltproject@h...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > As he said that, three gun batteries the size of an 18-
> > > wheeler 
> > > > > each
> > > > > > > > swung in line with him, ready to fire at the first 
> sign of 
> > > > > > > agressivity
> > > > > > > > or defiance. The only thing was that the Iron Skulls 
> had a 
> > > > > very 
> > > > > > > loose
> > > > > > > > definition of those words.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Sentry: You have trespassed on protected territory. 
> > > Decline 
> > > > > your
> > > > > > > > identity, and refrain from any inappropriate actions.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" 
> > > <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > >  Quickstrike had been wandering the various cities 
> of 
> > > this 
> > > > > > > planet 
> > > > > > > > >  disgusted at all of the weaklings he ran across.  
> But 
> > > now 
> > > > > he 
> > > > > > > had heard 
> > > > > > > > >  of people just as tough as he (thought that he) 
> was. He 
> > > > > held a 
> > > > > > > map up 
> > > > > > > > >  showing the way to the Iron Skull base.
> > > > > > > > >  "He ya!  I found it!  You ready to kick some 
> tail?"  He 
> > > > > asked 
> > > > > > > his 
> > > > > > > > >  snake head as if it were someone else.
> > > > > > > > >  "I"m a guess'in I just go up and knock." He said to 
> > > himself 
> > > > > as 
> > > > > > > he 
> > > > > > > > >  walked up to the iron doors of their base.
> > > > > > > > >  "Anyone home!?"  He called.
